Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 06/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
